backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing meeting intelligence backend with role-based access control, user profiles, meeting logs, panic events, audit logging, session recordings, and system health metrics with authorization checks on all operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting five implemented features: null-check guard for store initialization, homepage-view as default entry point, localStorage persistence repair, dashboard authentication guard, and spectral analysis component re-injection.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend source files including components, pages, hooks, and utilities with focus on authentication flow, dashboard layout, visualizations, and tier-based feature gating.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes defining colors for background, foreground, borders, charts, and sidebar components using oklch color space.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with PWA manifest, theme color, favicon, Inter font preload, and root div for React mounting.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining AXON Remote as a standalone portrait-mode mobile app with black theme and 192x192/512x512 icon assets.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component managing three views (homepage, login, dashboard) with forced homepage-view as default entry point, storage initialization on mount, session validation, and proper cleanup on logout.
frontend/src/components/admin/AuditLogVi: Displays a filterable, paginated table of audit logs with action filtering, CSV export functionality, and shows timestamp, action, user, status, and details for each log entry.
frontend/src/components/admin/SystemHeal: Monitors and displays backend system health metrics including cycles balance, heap memory, stable memory, and query/update call counts with visual progress bars and critical threshold alerts.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Biomet: Renders a radar chart displaying five biometric metrics (executive stress, vocal stability, background noise, packet health, privacy score) with simulated real-time updates every 4 seconds.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Emotio: Displays a stacked area chart tracking seven emotion types (joy, surprise, fear, disgust, anger, sadness, neutral) over time with toggleable emotion visibility and auto-refreshing data.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Global: Visualizes a global network map with four geographic nodes (San Francisco, London, Tokyo, Bangalore) showing animated pulse effects when nodes become active.
frontend/src/components/analytics/LiveTr: Renders a real-time area chart showing network traffic data that updates every 3 seconds with a sliding 20-point window.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Meetin: Displays a card component for a single meeting log showing title, duration, participant count, sentiment score, cost, and optional summary.
Shows a live-updating meeting cost ticker that increments by â‚¹12.5 per second with pause/resume functionality.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Neural: Displays a real-time scrolling log of simulated security events (encryption, packet, neural, quantum) with auto-generated entries every 2-3 seconds, maintaining the last 50 logs.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Quantu: Shows quantum encryption metrics in a 2x2 grid including key rotation rate, quantum resistance level, lattice crypto status, and a circular post-quantum readiness gauge that updates every 8 seconds.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Recent: Renders a static table of recent files with columns for name, security level, status, and owner, using color-coded badges for security levels and statuses.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Sentim: Displays a live area chart tracking vocal stress and emotional tension metrics over time, updating every 3 seconds with new data points while maintaining a 21-point rolling window.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Speake: Shows a list of speaker profiles with vocal frequency ranges and activity percentages, featuring animated progress bars that update every 3 seconds.
frontend/src/components/analytics/System: Displays a terminal-style scrolling log of system security events across six categories (encrypt, sensory, auth, network, biometric, packet), generating new entries every 2-3 seconds.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Threat: Presents a 4x4 grid of threat detection cells showing attack vectors vs categories with color-coded severity levels, threat counts, and active status indicators that refresh every 5 seconds.
frontend/src/components/analytics/VoiceP: Displays a timeline visualization of speaker voice patterns with segments showing speaker activity, volume, and duration across a 5-minute period. Includes interactive segment selection and real-time playback indicator.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthPanel.t: Reusable authentication panel wrapper component with tactical glass styling, scanlines overlay, AXON logo, and shake animation support for error states.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProtectedRo: Route guard component that checks for active session using local storage and redirects to login if unauthorized, showing a loading spinner during verification.
frontend/src/components/auth/RegisterVie: Registration form view with fields for full name, email, password, and password confirmation, including password visibility toggles and form validation.
frontend/src/components/auth/RoleProtect: Role-based route guard that verifies user permissions (admin or user) via API query and redirects to command center if access is denied, with loading state handling.
Sign-in form view with email/username and password fields, remember me checkbox, password visibility toggle, and social login buttons for Google and Facebook.
frontend/src/components/auth/ThreeBackgr: Animated 3D background using Three.js with floating geometric shapes (cubes, spheres, toruses) that rotate and float over a radial gradient backdrop.
frontend/src/components/common/ActiveSta: Small status indicator component displaying a pulsing green dot with tooltip showing 'Status: Active'.
frontend/src/components/common/FeatureLo: Full-screen overlay modal that displays when a feature is locked, prompting users to upgrade to Shield tier subscription with pricing and upgrade button.
frontend/src/components/common/HotkeysRe: Modal dialog displaying searchable keyboard shortcuts organized by category (Security, Privacy, System, Navigation) with accordion UI and escape/question-mark hotkey triggers.
frontend/src/components/common/MetricCar: Reusable card component displaying a metric with title, value, icon, and optional trend indicator (up/down arrow with color coding).
frontend/src/components/common/PrimaryCT: Styled primary call-to-action button with emerald gradient, hover effects, and scale animation.
frontend/src/components/common/SentinelP: Fixed floating panic button that triggers emergency protocol via mutation, shows confirmation dialog, and navigates to sentinel dashboard on activation.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Active: Card displaying team members with avatars and roles, allowing individual access revocation with toast notifications.
Static card displaying the current subscription plan (Sovereign Enterprise) with crown icon and description.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/AssetS: Card with animated currency counter that counts up to a target amount on dashboard initialization and auto-increments periodically to simulate protected asset value.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Contro: Card with toggle switches for Neural Shield and Stealth Mode features, persisting state to sessionStorage and logging events via telemetry context.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Global: Card with animated canvas visualization showing pulsing global node locations (NYC, London, Tokyo) with emerald glow effects on dark background.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/KPIMet: Displays four KPI metric cards showing secured meetings count, active global nodes, threats neutralized with a bar chart, and a sovereign health score with a radial chart.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/LiveSp: Renders an animated canvas-based waveform visualization that generates realistic spectral data using sine waves and starts animating when the dashboard is initialized.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Neural: Provides a URL input field with verification button for entering and validating secure meeting links, showing loading and verified states.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Overvi: Displays a system overview card with security health percentage, network stats (active sessions, neural efficiency), and team access metrics (team members, threats).
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Pricin: Renders three subscription tier cards (FREE, SOVEREIGN CORE, GLOBAL SHIELD) with features and subscribe buttons, managing tier selection via context.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Quantu: Shows a simple card displaying quantum interlink status with microphone state, latency, and participant count.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/QuickA: Provides quick action buttons for toggling ghost mode and performing tactical exit (logout with full session cleanup).
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Securi: Displays a line chart showing security traffic volume trends over the last 7 days using Recharts.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Spectr: Renders a card with an animated canvas displaying a gradient waveform that simulates spectral analysis with a "SIGNAL: STABLE" indicator.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Synops: Displays a card with a loading spinner and message indicating the Synopsis Engine is awaiting a verified meeting link to begin analysis.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/TeamMa: Provides a team member list with status indicators and the ability to revoke access for individual members with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/TeamSt: Shows a simple card displaying team members with their current status (active/idle) using status indicator dots.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Teleme: Displays a scrollable feed of telemetry events from the TelemetryContext with color-coded event types and timestamps.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/VocalH: Renders a circular progress indicator showing vocal health metrics (98.4/100) with an animated SVG gradient ring.
frontend/src/components/dev/PerformanceO: A development overlay that displays real-time FPS metrics, toggleable via Ctrl+Shift+F keyboard shortcut, with color-coded performance warnings.
frontend/src/components/effects/BorderBe: Creates an animated gradient beam effect that travels along the border of its container using CSS animations.
frontend/src/components/effects/Sovereig: Renders a 3D rotating orb with radial gradient and ripple effects on hover, representing a neural core visualization.
frontend/src/components/errors/ErrorBoun: React error boundary component that catches errors and displays a styled error card with options to retry or return home.
frontend/src/components/landing/Authorit: Displays a centered blockquote with decorative styling attributed to the Global Security Institute about digital sovereignty.
frontend/src/components/landing/BentoGri: Defines three preview components (AssetShieldPreview, VocalFingerprintPreview, GlobalNodeMapPreview) for the landing page bento grid, displaying animated stats, circular progress indicators, and a global node map visualization.
frontend/src/components/landing/Floating: Renders a decorative background with CSS-animated floating geometric shapes (circles and squares) with gradient colors and blur effects, plus a central glow element.
frontend/src/components/landing/HeroSect: Main landing page hero section with a two-column layout featuring headline text, CTA buttons, status indicators on the left, and the FloatingNodes3D visualization on the right.
frontend/src/components/layout/BentoCard: Reusable card wrapper component with optional BorderBeam effect, backdrop blur, and custom styling for bento grid layouts.
frontend/src/components/layout/Dashboard: Main dashboard layout component with sidebar navigation, user profile display, subscription tier badges, mobile menu support, and authentication checks. Handles navigation restrictions based on subscription tier.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Site footer with four-column grid layout containing brand info, product links, resources, and legal links, plus a bottom bar with copyright and social media icons.
frontend/src/components/MagneticButton.t: Button component with magnetic attraction effect that translates based on mouse position relative to the button with configurable strength and smooth transitions.
frontend/src/components/mobile/Biometric: Interactive biometric scanner component supporting fingerprint and face ID modes with animated scanning progress, haptic feedback, and success/error states.
frontend/src/components/neural/AIMirrorS: Status indicator component showing whether the AI neural proxy is ready or in standby mode with appropriate icons and messaging.
frontend/src/components/neural/NeuralPro: Displays a circular progress indicator with an animated SVG ring showing synthesis progress percentage and a gradient stroke.
frontend/src/components/neural/VocalDrop: Drag-and-drop file upload component that accepts audio files (MP3, WAV, M4A), displays uploaded files with metadata, and shows toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/neural/VoiceHeal: Displays three voice quality metrics (Pitch Stability, Clarity Index, Tone Quality) with icons, percentage values, and gradient progress bars.
frontend/src/components/scheduling/Secur: Calendar-based booking interface for scheduling security audit calls with date picker, time slot selection, and confirmation functionality.
frontend/src/components/security/DarkWeb: Real-time dark web threat monitoring dashboard that generates and displays threats with filtering by type/severity, severity counts, and CSV export capability.
frontend/src/components/sentinel/Acousti: Grid of clickable environment cards (office, jet, airport, etc.) that can be toggled active/inactive for acoustic masking scenarios.
frontend/src/components/sentinel/Environ: Audio mixer interface with volume sliders for eight different environment sounds (office, rain, cafe, etc.) with real-time volume control.
Grid of 16 environment audio spoofing options with play/stop toggle functionality and visual feedback for active environments.
frontend/src/components/sentinel/Hardwar: Displays fake OS update screens (Windows 11, macOS) in fullscreen overlay mode with close button for hardware mimicry scenarios.
frontend/src/components/sentinel/PacketJ: A component that simulates network packet jitter with a slider control, displaying audio quality, latency, and packet loss metrics, with a keyboard shortcut (Ctrl+Shift+L) to activate lag simulation.
frontend/src/components/sentinel/PanicPr: A full-screen overlay component that mimics a Windows 11 update screen with a progress bar, used as a panic mode disguise, dismissible via Ctrl+Shift+Q keyboard shortcut.
frontend/src/components/settings/Bandwid: A settings component for adjusting streaming quality presets (low/medium/high/ultra) to optimize bandwidth usage, displaying live bandwidth meter and estimated savings.
frontend/src/components/sync/ConnectionL: A terminal-style log viewer that displays WebSocket connection events, authentication messages, and Diffie-Hellman key exchange status with simulated periodic updates.
frontend/src/components/testimonials/Tes: A reusable card component for displaying user testimonials with avatar, name, title, 5-star rating, and quote text.
frontend/src/components/transitions/Neur: A full-screen transition component showing an animated neural scan effect with progress bar and AXON logo, completing after reaching 100%.
frontend/src/components/transitions/Page: A simple wrapper component that applies a fade-in animation to its children for page transitions.
frontend/src/components/vault/IntelSessi: A card component displaying meeting session details with collapsible sections for AI analysis (sentiment, cost) and transcript viewing.
frontend/src/components/vault/Subscripti: A subscription tier card component showing plan name, pricing (monthly/yearly), feature list, and selection state with border beam effect when selected.
A subscription management component displaying three tiers (FREE, SOVEREIGN CORE, GLOBAL SHIELD) with monthly/yearly toggle, persisting selection to localStorage and triggering storage events.
A toggle switch component for selecting between monthly and yearly billing periods, with a visual indicator showing 20% savings for yearly subscriptions.
frontend/src/components/video/VideoWelco: A floating video widget with play/pause, minimize/maximize, and close controls that displays an operator briefing video thumbnail with playback simulation.
frontend/src/components/visualizer/Netwo: A 3D globe visualization using Three.js that displays global network nodes with color-coded latency indicators and animated connection arcs between locations.
frontend/src/components/visualizer/Neura: A canvas-based audio wave visualizer that renders animated sine waves in blue and purple to simulate real-time frequency analysis.
frontend/src/components/visualizer/Water: A canvas-based waterfall spectrogram that continuously scrolls frequency bars downward with green gradient intensity to visualize audio spectrum over time.
frontend/src/contexts/GhostModeContext.t: A React context provider that manages ghost mode state with session storage persistence and provides a toggle function to child components.
frontend/src/contexts/TelemetryContext.t: A React context provider that manages a log of telemetry events with timestamps and severity types, keeping the last 50 events in memory.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React Query hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useHapticFeedback.ts: A hook that provides haptic feedback functions (light, medium, heavy) using the browser's vibration API if available.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: A comprehensive hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useKeyboardShortcut.t: A hook that listens for keyboard shortcuts by tracking pressed keys and triggering a callback when all specified keys are pressed simultaneously.
frontend/src/hooks/useMousePosition.ts: React hook that tracks mouse position relative to the center of a referenced HTML element, returning x and y coordinates.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, roles, meeting logs, panic protocol, and admin features using TanStack Query and the actor backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubscriptionTier.t: React hook managing subscription tiers (free, core, shield) with localStorage persistence and feature unlock flags for Neural Lab, Sentinel Protocol, and Spectral Analysis.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, glassmorphic effects, tactical UI styles, and keyframe animations for floating nodes and page transitions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the root component with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin dashboard page with tabs for user management, audit logs, and system health monitoring, displaying current user profile and role information.
frontend/src/pages/AnalyticsVault.tsx: Page displaying subscription tiers and archived meeting logs (intel sessions) in a grid layout with loading states and empty state handling.
frontend/src/pages/CommandCenter.tsx: Main dashboard page with session validation, displaying overview, KPI metrics, neural ingest input, synopsis engine, asset shield, and tier-gated spectral analysis components.
frontend/src/pages/DeviceSync.tsx: Provides device synchronization interface with QR code display for pairing mobile devices and a connection log component.
frontend/src/pages/DevMetrics.tsx: Displays system health metrics including cycles balance, heap/stable memory usage, and real-time memory charts with critical threshold alerts and refresh functionality.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Main landing page featuring hero section, authority quote, bento grid preview, testimonials, pricing table, and footer with login callback.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Handles Internet Identity authentication flow, profile setup for new users, and session management with localStorage integration.
frontend/src/pages/MobileBiometric.tsx: Mobile-specific page displaying biometric scanner component with navigation back to remote control interface.
frontend/src/pages/NeuralLab.tsx: Voice cloning interface with persona specification input, vocal sample upload, neural synthesis progress tracking, voice health dashboard, and AI mirror status display.
frontend/src/pages/SentinelProtocol.tsx: Tactical countermeasures dashboard featuring acoustic matrix, panic mode activation, environment spoofing, packet jitter simulation, and hardware mimicry with subscription tier gating.
frontend/src/pages/Settings.tsx: Settings page containing bandwidth optimizer component for performance tuning.
frontend/src/pages/Subscriptions.tsx: Displays subscription tier selection page with three plans (Free, Sovereign Core, Global Shield) showing pricing, features, and allowing users to switch tiers with toast notifications.
frontend/src/pages/TacticalRemote.tsx: Mobile-optimized tactical control interface with large buttons for panic mode, lag simulation, environment spoofing, and biometric scanning, featuring haptic feedback and toast notifications.
frontend/src/pages/TeamManagementPage.ts: Simple team management page that displays the ActiveIdentitiesCard component for managing team members and access levels.
frontend/src/pages/UnifiedDashboard.tsx: Main dashboard component with sidebar navigation, subscription tier badges, and conditional rendering of features (Command Center, Neural Lab, Sentinel Protocol, Device Sync, Vault) based on user's subscription tier.
frontend/src/utils/localStorageAuth.ts: Provides localStorage-based authentication utilities with basic encryption/decryption for user registration, login validation, session management, and subscription tier handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting and managing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support for maintaining state across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining dark mode, custom color palette using OKLCH color space with CSS variables, extended theme settings including container, border radius, fonts (Inter/Georgia), and accordion animations. Includes plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state document tracking a dashboard application with authentication, subscription tiers, and feature components (Spectral Analysis, Asset Shield). Documents a critical store initialization bug causing null reference errors and lists 8 features to fix state management, localStorage persistence, view routing, and component restoration while maintaining glassmorphic dark theme.
